stories.tease: There are three sides to every cable news story: MSNBC’s, Fox News’, and CNN’s. The contrast in on-screen text is stark.
What were the dominant topics Congressional members were tweeting (and not tweeting) about in 2019?
Emojis are nice, but GIFs have range. We looked at how we use these looped clips of celebs to convey feelings.

author.name: Charlie Smart
author.bio: is a journalist, designer, and web tinkerer. He likes good food and good music.
